tool_description: Encodes video content into multiple bitrate versions simultaneously using specified profiles and encoding parameters for adaptive streaming delivery.

input_video_path.description: Path to the source video file

output_directory.description: Directory where encoded files will be saved

codec.description: Video codec to use for encoding

segment_duration.description: Segment duration in seconds for adaptive streaming

encoding_preset.description: Encoding speed/quality preset: fast, medium, slow

error_messages: Input file not found: Verify the input_video_path exists and is readable
Output directory error: Ensure output_directory exists and is writable
Mismatched profiles: bitrate_profiles and resolution_profiles must have equal lengths
Invalid codec: Use supported codecs (H.264, H.265, VP9, AV1)
Invalid segment duration: Must be between 2 and 30 seconds
Hardware acceleration unavailable: Disable hardware acceleration or install appropriate drivers
usage: Provide input video path, output directory, and matching bitrate/resolution profiles. The tool will encode the video into multiple versions optimized for adaptive streaming.

encoded_files.description: Paths to successfully encoded video files

encoding_duration_seconds.description: Total time taken for encoding process

total_output_size_mb.description: Combined size of all encoded files in megabytes

failed_encodings.description: List of failed encoding attempts with reasons
